Hello! 
Here is your Two Factor login OTP: {0}. 

If you didn't request this code, please change your password immediately. 

Please do not share this code with anyone.

Texts.Enum:Stage.1.HelpMessage:
The vehicle is currently in transit.
Once the vehicle arrives, it will be moved to the Dealer Warehouse (External) through the completion of the check-in form.
Texts.Enum:Stage.2.HelpMessage:
The vehicle is currently in Dealer Warehouse (External).
Once the vehicle arrives, it will be moved to the SCD Warehouse through the completion of the check-in form.
Texts.Enum:Stage.3.HelpMessage:
The vehicle has been qualified for production and is ready to be taken by the production team.
The vehicle is manually moved into a bay from this location. Can only be moved if there are no non-deferred issues.
Texts.Enum:Stage.4.HelpMessage:
The vehicle is currently undergoing remanufacturing.
After all station checklists are completed, the vehicle will eligible to be moved to the Post Production queue.
Texts.Enum:Stage.5.HelpMessage:
The vehicle has completed all manufacturing processes and is now undergoing inspection by the Quality Control Team, with any necessary rework being performed at this stage. Vehicles should be moved in and out of QC bays by the user.
Vehicles will automatically progress to Quality Release once the QC & Post Rework PDI checklists have been completed, and there are no non-deferred issues.
Texts.Enum:Stage.6.HelpMessage:
The vehicle has completed all processes and is now awaiting pick-up by the transport company. Once the vehicle is sent for transport, the dispatch form will be completed, and the vehicle will be moved to the Dispatched status.
This is simply a holding stage before the vehicle is officially dispatched from the site to the customer. The vehicle shows up here if the transport date has been updated.
Once the vehicle has been uploaded to the RAV, it will be eligible to move to Dispatched through completion of the dispatch form.
Texts.QualityGates.HelpMessageHtml:
Green: No open findings. All items within specification. Vehicle is cleared to proceed.

Red: No Blue findings, but one or more Red findings present. Vehicle may progress only if the internal customer accepts the issue. Status remains Not OK for external customer and must be resolved prior to delivery.

Yellow: No Blue or Red findings, but one or more Yellow findings present. Vehicle may proceed to the next internal process. Issue must still be documented and closed before PDI.

Blue: One or more Blue findings present. Vehicle is not permitted to proceed.
